description:
Leakproof when closed, easy sippin’ when open. Outfitted with Hydro Flask’s Flex Straw Cap, this bottle makes takes some of the work out of staying hydrated. Hydro Flask’s clever insulation keeps your drinks at the temperature you like them.

  • Made of 18/8 food-grade stainless steel
  • TempShield™ double-wall insulation keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours and won’t sweat on you
  • Flex Straw Cap has integrated insulation and is leakproof when closed
  • Tough powder-coated finish is dishwasher safe
  • Wide mouth opening fits many existing filters and lids
  • Large opening is great for adding ice cubes
  • Loop top handle for easy carrying
name: Hydro Flask Wide Mouth Flex Straw Cap Bottle 710ml
